title: haNNu kombaru
sahitya:
haNNu kombaru banni haridAsaru ciNNa bAlakrSNanembo hesarina haNNu


caraNam 1    ajana paDeda haNNu gajava salahida haNNu trijagAdi guruvige tOrda haNNu 
trijaga vandita pAlanembo mAvina haNNu sujana gandhiyare nIvu koLa bannirammayya
    caraNam 2    munnobbajAmiLana pApa aLida haNNu kanneyarabhimAna kyida haNNu pannaga 
shAyi pAlkaDaloDeyanembo haNNu cenna krSNanembo haNNu koLa bannirammayya
    caraNam 3    eraDENTu sAvira gOpIrALida haNNu karedare kambhadinda O enda haNNu maruguva 
dhruvana unnata mADida haNNu purandara viTTalanembo haNNu koLa bannirammayya
